GAME_META_DESCRIPTION: Play Space Shooter online for free - a fast-paced arcade shooting game where you battle waves of alien invaders.
GAME_OG_DESCRIPTION: Defend Earth from invading alien forces in this action-packed space adventure.
GAME_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Blast alien ships in this exciting arcade space shooter

GAME_FEATURES.title: Fast-Paced Action
GAME_FEATURES.description: Experience intense arcade shooting with rapid-fire weapons and explosive effects.

GAME_FEATURES.title: Multiple Spaceships
GAME_FEATURES.description: Choose from various spacecraft, each with different weapons and capabilities.

GAME_FEATURES.title: Power-Up System
GAME_FEATURES.description: Collect power-ups to enhance your weapons and defenses during gameplay.

GAME_TIPS: Focus on destroying enemies with power-ups first
Save your special weapon for boss encounters
Don't stay in one place too long
Watch for patterns in enemy movements
GAME_DESCRIPTION:
Space Shooter is a classic arcade-style game where you control a powerful spaceship defending Earth from alien invaders. Your mission is to defeat waves of enemy ships while avoiding their attacks.

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter increasingly difficult enemies and powerful boss ships. Collect power-ups to upgrade your weapons and increase your chances of survival.

With simple controls and addictive gameplay, Space Shooter offers the perfect balance of challenge and fun for both casual and hardcore gamers.

SIMILAR_GAMES.title: Monster Survivors
SIMILAR_GAMES.description: Battle endless waves of monsters in this roguelike game.

SIMILAR_GAMES.title: Galaxy Defender
SIMILAR_GAMES.description: Protect your galaxy from alien invasion.
